page.title: 12Life Style Mark's Day
page.content: Every morning my mom drags me out of a nice warm bed. I pick my clothes up and stagger downstairs. It is 7.45 when I switch on the heating and get dressed. Then in comes my mom who turns on the radio, Mike Read again-boring! She asks us what we want for breakfast, my sister has "Shreddies" and I have "Ready Brek". After breakfast I go into my room and pack my bag, then I clean my teeth. I walk to school with my friends. At school I get the piano ready for assembly which is at 9.00.Then we have our lessons like maths in which we are doing percentages at present. During the day we have a break in the morning when we have our milk and a break at lunchtime when we have school dinners. My favourite lesson is swimming when we are taken by coach to the local baths. School finishes at 3.45.
